appDescription.message: This extension gather OAuth2.0 history and retrieves scope usage by application. https://github.com/Sparika/history-addons.

aboutConnect.message:
Extension to gather OpenID Connect/OAuth history and retrieves scope usage.

The goal of this addon is to discover OAuth usage by websites. Finding OAuth request parameters allows us to establish mapping and categorization of OAuth and OpenID Connect usage by web sites visited by users. To do so, this extension browse you navigation history in seach for OAuth request in visited urls. These urls do not contain private information.

The full code is visible at https://github.com/Sparika/history-addons.
